attribute.description: Chip ec feature attribute to differentiate simple spy/register name changes.

The DL half width backoff enable bit in DL_CONFIG0_CFG (bit 47)
Bypass MENTERP register read/writes on gemini due to FW bug
Setup config registers for gemini in exp_omi_setup
The processor only supports downstream OMI tempaltes 0, 1, 4, and 7.
The processor only supports upstream OMI tempaltes 0, 1, 5, and 9.
Itag stuck in same state for too long (wait4issue. lsu err inj, critical marked branch at NTC)
Critical Not Sent is valid however the Itag is already Finished For (NML, STF Error Inj)
IFU North error detected Recoverable iffec iffbc miss not pending error
hreset but t2 ict not empty - xfvc err inj
IBI Register Miscompare VSR (nml, dynamic set delete, lvewx)
VSU bugspray stf01_tag0x000_dw0_mismatch fires during recovery
IFU loses prefix address when taking 0xe60 HMI interrupt and returns to the middle of the instruction
Fix scan flush value of inflight tlbie queue
enables DD2 only performance dials
HW534459 - mask NCU ERR_RPT(26) since it can errantly go off.
MMA ABIST engine tied to CL2 ABIST enable
Checkstop on NMMU array parity errors
Fix for init value of the PSCRS registers
Adding extra cycle of delay to DDS to better model DD2
Wee Trucks - PB clock gate prevents switching the fabric into low latency mode disabling the long path
Facilities have dd1 hierachy
EQ parallel scan requires flush of RTIM before initiating scan operation to avoid spurious PARALLE_SCAN_COMPARE_ERR
Allows to access less than 32K IOP XRAM.
Fix scan flush value of L3 REFMOD3 timeout
Fix L3 LRU default setting

Cresp token manager link underflow with hotplug + full-qtr psave mode Workaround is to disable DLR prior to any hotplug operations, and restore the DLR enablement state after the hotplug operation completes. Fixed in DD2.0, but leaving workaround enabled for P10 project.
Disable MMIO Atag Reuse bug fix on NX Utilization (read-only) registers
Mask powerbus hangs from causing checkstops through NX UMAC fir
Tepid Moonbeam: Avoid NMMU deadlock with back invalidates and NX check in/out requests by allowing only a single outstanding NX miss queue entry at a time
Worthwhile Toad: Trigger recovery in RAM setup sequence to avoid hang when performing RAM in SMT2/4
Flickering Dinosaurs: Avoid trigging recovery in RAM setup sequence for HW533775 in order to avoid hang when performing RAM to inactive threads
Unstable E/POFF during recalibration
Set PC NxC P1 Correctable ECC errors to be fatal so that a chkstop occurs if any CE occurs
Set hyp_hard_range = 0b00 (Thread ID is 7 bits) (this bug will not be fixed for P10)
Don't write VSD array to fix an ECC SBE. This change is needed in both PC and VC for DD1 only.
Don't send Hyp Pool ChkOut request until Hyp Hard ChkOut request is done.
Disable true priority order presentation on the OS level
Disable clock gating from NxC Regs to P0/P1
Disable clock gating in int_pc.atx.tctxt
Set PC NxC P0 Correctable ECC errors to be fatal so that a chkstop occurs if any CE occurs
QME doesn't respond to special wakeup request for cores which are in STOP0.
USTLCFG WRSTUCK mitigation
USTL Low Latency Double Dead Support
PBA clock gating errors require disabling clock gating
Make sure that we first get IPB in before scan
P10 DD1 only Disable ChkOut wait timer
DD2 IOBIST: latch offsets spread too far out
Numerous defects surrounding DLR with link retrains and high error rates for DD1. Checkstop on indicators of link errors from the DLP FIR if DLR is enabled to avoid encounters with the known issues.

Set ATTR_OMI_CHANNEL_FAIL_ACTION related FIRs to XSTOP for DD1. For DD2+ leave it as LOCAL_XSTOP. Affects the following FIRs: DSTLFIR_SUBCHANNEL_A/B_COUNTER_ERROR DSTLFIR_SUBCHANNEL_A/B_BUFFER_OVERUSE_ERROR DSTLFIR_SUBCHANNEL_A/B_CHANNEL_TIMEOUT DSTLFIR_SUBCHANNEL_A/B_PARITY_ERROR DSTLFIR_SUBCHANNEL_A/B_TLX_CHECKSTOP USTLFIR_CHANA/B_UNEXP_DATA_ERR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_INVALID_TEMPLATE_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_FAIL_RESP_CHECKSTOP USTLFIR_CHANA/B_FLIT_PARITY_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_FATAL_PARITY_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_BAD_RESP_LOG_VAL USTLFIR_CHANA/B_EXCESS_BAD_DATA_BITS USTLFIR_CHANA/B_COMP_TMPL0_DATA_NOT_MMIO USTLFIR_CHANA/B_EXCESS_DATA_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_BADCRC_DATA_NOT_VALID_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_FIFO_OVERFLOW_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_INVALID_CMD_ERROR USTLFIR_CHANA/B_INVALID_DL_DP_COMBO MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL0_FATAL_ERROR (recoverable on DD2+) MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL1_FATAL_ERROR (recoverable on DD2+)
Mask OMI CRC FIRs for DD1. For DD2+ leave them as RECOVERABLE. Affects the following FIRs: MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL0_CRC_ERROR MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL1_CRC_ERROR
Mask OMI EDPL FIRs for DD1. For DD2+ leave them as RECOVERABLE. Affects the following FIRs: MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL0_EDPL MC_OMI_FIR_REG_DL1_EDPL
Set up OMI recal timer to 100ms for DD1.
Adjust PLL calibration point by using observed BANDSEL to program adjustment via CCALBANDSEL
Adjust PLL calibration point by using observed BANDSEL to program adjustment via CCALBANDSEL
Distinct Hazard -- set all CPLT_CTRL5 power gate enables
Disable NCU and L2 swizzle of logical TID based on EX position in fused core mode. Trust what the core sends directly.
HW549975 - DD2 update the L2 SQ gather multipliers
DD2 - enable spares used in HW540443 to update L2 ld-hit-st priority
enables DD2 only performance dials
DD2 - enables L2 workaround for HW562262 Plucky Demonstrator and HW562265 Venerated Voyage
Work-around inadvertant QNE check on Topology entry 0
Only set MCMODE0_DISABLE_MC_SYNC to 0 on primary MC on P10 DD1.0 during p10_throttle_sync.
Disable XSL Parity Fir Bit from fencing and killing PAU updated pau init files to workaround XSL error HW530359 for DD1
Disable IBM_I tags mode to avoid issues with ECC bits not be corrected when wrong
XTS incorrectly flags returning real address as an error. masking cerr bit in XTS
XSL can miss accesses to aged out pages, so 32 cycle delay must be forced.
Adjust TX PMA lane clockgen alignment to acquire stable GEN4 link training
Disable HW519165 Fix so we don't get UEs running around the system on channel fails
MC DD2 Performance Enhancements
MCD configuration register parity error FIR is unreliable for DD1
Lethal Coffee - AX data onramp async buffer issue
Half width mode changed for dd2, so check release to determine how we will calculate TDR length
Limits the frequency of DD1 parts due to timing and processing limitations
Determines whether to place OMI frequency governor
Disable timefac shadow clock gating for tod step, sync latches to prevent core to shadow xfer errors
Enable USTL Self Detect Dead Cycle to protect against Jazzy Rabbit DI
Correct the MC Low Latency Mode cold start threshold
HW560874 Waterlogged Diplomacy – L2 STQ_TEMP_MARK_ERR
Mask MCFIR[23] Sync Error due to dd1 bug
Set Mirrored MDI maintenance mode to legacy behavior
P10 Lab: Bland Alligator - Powermixer stop 2 test hits TOD sync timeout errors causing TB to freeze
Enable MC PAU Workaround
DD1 - bump PAU DPLL default from 2.050 GHz to 2.133 GHz for IO margin
P10 Lab: Naive Broccoli - Powermixer stop 11 tests hit TB Residue Errors prior to shadow to core xfer on stop 11 exit
Wealthy Quirk -- disable SPURR, PURR parity error in timefac shadow due to missing logic relative to the core implementation
Chip is capable of internal near-end termination on outgoing refclocks.
Linear Onrush -- adjust refclock termination prior to clock test
Disables the clock check for RCS in DD1 because the UNLOCKDET bits are unreliable, and therefore, always cause this check to fail
Thundering Brisket -- adjust crc link fail max counter value
Process eq_inex scan rings inits during IPL
Nutty Polygon -- increase number of delay cycles in TXI data array to be within allowable configuration range
Set MMA available via the QME in contained mode
Set Tepid Moonbeam workaround
HW532820 : Hard reset on one link causing error on the other link
Enable setup of cHTMs for core tracing activity. DD2 feature only.
Non-targeted chips need to check CAM for new rcmds when Vt=1.
Avoid using SPRs that are not available on DD1.
Two genid_syncs can both be considered the "biggest". This results in or-ing the ttags/tickets which causes the genid logic to never go idle.
HW529136 - DD2 Link underflow in CR tok mgr added 2 fir bits
HW555009 - Mask off fallout LOLDROP reason from DL Fix for Jazzy Rabbit
Correct XTS_CONFIG3 parity. Parity was incorrect due to new scanflush value and existing scaninit
Indicates that #V Model Data(6) is mark for accurate TDP currents.
Allow the enablement of the Voltage Reference circuit needed by the Retention VRMs.
Disable DDSs if EC = 10
Determine if chip supports dynamic Core LPAR mode switching
Determine if chip supports MC Command List Early Hang FIR
ECP.NC.NCCHTM.NCCHTSC.HTM_MODE: IMA enabe/disable bit control is with 1bit in DD2, we need to disable this bit during MPIPL down path
Use static pound V data for pstates if EC = 10
Mutlicast operations to downstream OCMB chips is not supported via multicast
Allow for PAU frequency based VDN uplift on DD20+ parts
Disable Memcntl commands before OMI training for RAS
Use HWP code to swap DTS sensor coefficients across PAU GPTR rings to account for MVPD issues
Set PEC dials for HW507934 on DD2
Set MCWAT dials for HW573834 Mirrored Channel Fail workaround
Set NMMU dials for SW525387 on DD2
I2C OCMB Security Capable
I/O PHY DFE Swizzle
We support WOF static io power from dd2 onwards
